original_title: How to Seduce a Straight Man
overview: Four tales of seducing straight men: While their girlfriends are getting beer, a guy seduces his buddy in the hot tub. Next, a drunk young man with marital problems sleeps over at his gay friend's house. Third, a muscular young man at the drive-in checking out girls finds a surprise in his buddy's popcorn. Finally, a hitchhiker gets a ride and finds a gay porn magazine in the glove compartment, which leads to an embarrassing situation later when he gets caught taking another peek at it!
title: How to Seduce a Straight Man
